search.query: | makeresults count=12 | streamstats count | eval name = CASE (count==1, "Human Resource", count==2, "Marketing", count==3, "Customer Support", count==4, "Sales", count==5, "Accounting", count==6, "Distribution", count==7, "Research and Development", count==8, "Management", count==9, "Production", count==10, "Operations", count==11, "Legal", count==12, "Purchasing") | eval count = random()%100 | stats sum(count) as count by name | eval text_colour="black", stroke_width=10, stroke_colour="black" | eval background_colour= CASE( count <= 30, "#c23b35", count <= 60, "#f1f227", 1==1, "#66c430" ) | `svg_viz_circle_complex(count,text_colour,background_colour,stroke_width,stroke_colour)`

| makeresults count=4 | streamstats count | eval name = CASE (count==1, "Website", count==2, "Intranet", count==3, "Operating System", count==4, "Database") | eval count = random()%100 | stats sum(count) as count by name | eval text_colour="black", stroke_width=10, stroke_colour="black" | eval background_colour= CASE( count <= 30, "#c23b35", count <= 60, "#f1f227", 1==1, "#66c430" ) | `svg_viz_square_complex(count,text_colour,background_colour,stroke_width,stroke_colour)`
